articles.title: Virginia juvenile detention center ending federal contract
articles.description: ALEXANDRIA, Va. (AP) — The Northern Virginia Juvenile Detention Center is ending its contract with the federal government amid local objections to holding non-criminal children in jail-like settings.

articles.author: Associated Press, Michael Biesecker, Jake Pearson and Garance Burke, Associated Press
articles.title: Young immigrants detained in Virginia center allege abuse
articles.description: Immigrant children housed at a juvenile detention center say they were beaten and locked up in solitary confinement, left nude and shivering in concrete cells

articles.author: By MICHAEL BIESECKER, JAKE PEARSON and GARANCE BURKE Associated Press
articles.title: Young immigrants detained in Staunton juvenile detention center allege abuse
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Immigrant children as young as 14 housed at a juvenile detention center in Virginia say they were beaten while handcuffed and locked up for long periods in solitary confinement, left nude and shivering in concrete cells.

articles.author: BY ELLIE SILVERMAN The Washington Post
articles.title: Second worker charged in teen patient's death at health care center in Northern Virginia
articles.description: A second health care worker has been charged with involuntary manslaughter in connection with the death of a 15-year-old patient at a behavioral health care center in Northern Virginia, police said.

articles.author: By Michael Martz Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: Juvenile justice system at crossroads in transformation
articles.description: Albert was preparing to leave Bon Air Juvenile Correctional Center after more than three years in Virginia’s last remaining maximum-security youth prison, and his mother wanted him home in Henrico County.

articles.title: RTD Exclusive: The firewall against Medicaid expansion has fallen in the Virginia House of Delegates, budget proposal shows

articles.title: House budget would expand Medicaid, seek federal approval of work requirement
